problem:
theory PlusAssoc
  imports Main
begin


(* 定义关联性（associativity） *)
definition assoc :: "(int \<Rightarrow> int \<Rightarrow> int) \<Rightarrow> bool" where
  "assoc f \<longleftrightarrow> (\<forall>x y z. f x (f y z) = f (f x y) z)"

(* 证明加法是关联的 *)
lemma plus_assoc: "assoc (\<lambda>x y. x + y)"
(* Fill Your Proof Here *)
end
